heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_void_spirit
heroes.bio_loc:
Not even the other spirits claim to understand the mind and machinations of the eldest amongst them, Inai the Void Spirit. Privy to secrets that would shatter a mortal mind, the Void Spirit observes the workings of the universe from an unknowable vantage, choosing to let carefully groomed servants do his bidding -- only emerging from his Hidden Temple into the material plane when he deems that he alone can steer the course of reality along its proper path.

With an expansive perspective on existence, Inai is focused intently on a point in time beyond which he cannot see, when the fabrics of multiple realities are fated to collide. Now he steps from the aether to personally resolve the battle of the Ancients and prepare his allies for what he views as a greater conflict to come.
heroes.hype_loc: Privy to secrets that would shatter a mortal mind, the Void Spirit emerges from his Hidden Temple to stand guard over multiple areas of the battlefield at once. Able to step into and out of the mortal plane at will, he easily outmaneuvers opponents to strike from wherever he desires, calling upon the powers of the aether to shield him in times of need.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Steps in and out of the mortal plane to strike his foes

facets.description_loc: Resonant Pulse creates an all damage barrier.
facets.name: void_spirit_sanctuary

facets.description_loc: Void Spirit gains a physical damage barrier when dealing magic damage to enemy heroes.
facets.name: void_spirit_phys_barrier

abilities.name: void_spirit_aether_remnant
abilities.desc_loc: Void Spirit dispatches a remnant to the target location. The remnant stands watch over the region, facing the direction of his vector. When a unit crosses its gaze, the remnant pulls it in and damages it.
abilities.lore_loc: Inai exists far beyond the scope of a single point in space and time.
abilities.shard_loc: Increases Aether Remnant watch range and only pulls enemy hero units. Other units take %creep_damage_pct%%% damage every %damage_tick_rate%s that they are in the remnant's path, but the remnant is not destroyed. Decreases cooldown to %AbilityCooldown%s.

abilities.name: void_spirit_dissimilate
abilities.desc_loc: Void Spirit temporarily fades into the aether, creating a number of portals through which he can reassemble himself. Upon exiting a portal, he damages all enemies in the area.
abilities.lore_loc: Inai much prefers to observe our plane free from the confines of corporeal form.
abilities.shard_loc: Adds a partial outer ring to Dissimilate. Increases damage by %shard_bonus_damage%.

abilities.name: void_spirit_resonant_pulse
abilities.desc_loc: Void Spirit emits a single damaging pulse around him.
abilities.lore_loc: Inai never hesitates to shroud himself in the essence of his true self when forced to interact with the mortal plane.
abilities.scepter_loc: Causes Resonant Pulse to silence and gain %max_charges% charges.
facets_loc: Resonant Pulse creates an all damage barrier.

abilities.name: void_spirit_intrinsic_edge
abilities.desc_loc: Void Spirit gains %secondary_stat_bonus_pct%%% more secondary bonuses from all of his stats.

abilities.name: void_spirit_astral_step
abilities.desc_loc: Void Spirit tears a rift through the astral plane to appear at the target location, attacking all enemies along the path. This attack inflicts a void mark that slows for %pop_damage_delay% seconds and then detonates.
abilities.lore_loc: A small step for Inai creates great devastation on the mortal plane.
notes_loc: Astral Step attacks do not cleave.
abilities.shard_loc: Void Spirits attacks have a %attack_chance_pct%%% Chance, and Non-Ult Spells a %ability_chance_pct%%% Chance to put a Void Mark on the Enemy.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_void_spirit_dissimilate_outerring
talents.desc_loc: Add a partial outer ring to Dissimilate

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_void_spirit_8
talents.desc_loc: Attacks made with Astral Step deal a critical strike.

abilities.name: void_spirit_symmetry
abilities.desc_loc: Void Spirit gains a physical damage barrier when dealing magic damage to enemy heroes.
